reviews.review: Whilst a good little update to Half-Life, you'd be much better off buying the original (which costs the same as HL:S) as it's less buggy. However, if ragdolls, more realistic water and slightly better colour saturation are extremely important to you, Half-Life: Source is still an excellent choice.
游戏自然是没话说    就冲人物对话是中文  这个好评我就给定了

Half-Life foi o primeiro jogo lançado pela Valve...

Em 1998 as pessoas conheceram Gordon Freeman, um cientista bolado que vestiu uma armadura laranja e foi matar alienigenas em "Half Life". Talvez você pense que o jogo é ruim, pelo fato dele ser tãão antigo, BUT, ele é perfeito.

Uma coisa que chama atenção em Half Life, é o local em sí, pois se deram o trabalho de realmente fazer parecer que esta a jogar em um Laboratorio. Inclusive varios outros cientistas e guardas [spoiler](Aparentemente Iguais e-e)[/spoiler].

Se você não é um jogador fluente em inglês, procure saber a historia do game primeiro, entender os personagens e tudo mais, por que sim, o jogo esta 100% em Inglês, o maximo que a Valve/Steam fez por você, é que se a sua steam (creio eu) estiver em português, sera traduzido apenas o nome dos Capitulos/Fases/Levels (Chame como queira) e tambem informações no final do game ("Emprego Novo" e-e).

A trilha sonora do HL1 deve ser bem aprecisada. O jogo, a maior parte do tempo é totalmente silencioso em questão de musica, a unica coisa que você ouvira são os alienigenas, como o barulho de seus ataques e seus gemidos agonizantes de dor ao morrer HU3. As musicas surgem em partes importantes do jogo, e normalmente são umas musiquinhas eletronicas, acompanhada de altas batidas maneira ou derrepente algo mais "NINJA". Uma musica do game que eu curto demais é a "Nuclear Mission Jam".

E voltando a questão do Silencio, ele não vai deixar seu jogo intediante, muito pelo contrario, ja que ele ira colaborar para os sustos do jogo (KABUM, EXPLOSÃO, ALIEN ATACANDO, SOLDADOS, AVIÕES)...

Basicamente é isso, procure entender a historia do game, pesquise no youtube, tem uns videos explicando tudo certinho e tals. (caso não manje muito de inglês, ja que nem legenda tem) e ai é so comprar o jogo e se divertir meu amigo =D

Caso achar algum erro na minha analise, porfavor comentar para que eu arrume =D

Чтож, прежде всего хочу сказать, что если вы стоите перед выбором: оригинальная или на движке Source, то без сомнений берите оригинальную, потому что:
[olist]
    [*]Частые баги с персонажами (Например тот же учёный в комнате наблюдения у тестовой камеры, который по-идее сидит на кресле, на самом деле висит в воздухе над ним)
    [*]Проблемы с текстурами. К примеру на локации "Поверхностное натяжение", посмотрев на небо, вы в этом убедитесь.
    [*]AI непонятным образом стали ещё тупее. Т.е ты можешь вплотную стоять перед вортигонтом, а он при этом вас даже не ударит. Вояки, которые так же могут вас прекрасно видеть но при этом ничего не делать. Или же любимые хэткрабы, которые будут вас атаковать только если вы подойдёте к ним на расстояние вытянутой монтировки.
 [*]Так же у вояк есть проблема с оружием. После их смерти, оно может зависнуть в воздухе (что в оригинале не наблюдалось)
 [*]Тут я уже не знаю, недостаток ли это, но переделанны текстуры некоторых оружий (явно использованные в Black Mesa), которые в сочетании с текстурами 98го года выглядят не очень. А так же текстуры персонажей. К примеру, на того же GMan'а смотреть было слегка непривычно и неприятно что-ли
[/olist]
В качестве плюсов хочу всё таки отметить особенности вышеупомянутого движка, т.е это физика, шейдэры. Кстати, касаемо физики. Упавшие частицы, которые исчезают через пару секунд, никуда не делись. Это приводит в серьёзный конфуз: вроде как Source, физика, все дела, а работать над этим не стали. 
В общем, я как злостный фанат данной серии игр, не рекоммендую вам сие версию игры. Купите лучше оригинал
Хорошая игра я прошёл на лёгком уровне сложности я новичок по синголу новичкам советую
Fantastic game, just as good as Half-Life 2.

[ITA]
[h1]Si ritorna alle origini di questo capolavoro con questa versione di gioco![/h1]
Questa versione di Half Life, la cosiddetta "Source", offre ai giocatori di giocare un titolo con una grafica leggermente rimasterizzata (i modelli e le texture, infatti, sono quelli del gioco originale) che gira appunto sull'omonimo motore grafico.
Per quanto riguarda la storyline, è del tutto invariata dal titolo del lontano 1998. Ciò non toglie che rimane una delle migliori in circolazione, perchè riesce a mescolare in modo perfetto un normale FPS (dove non si può mirare) ad un puzzle game.
[ENG]
[h1]We can return in the past of this masterpiece with this game version![/h1]
This version of Hal Life, also known as "Source", gives to the players a gameplay with a little bit remastered graphic (models and textures are from the old version), and it runs in the homonym engine.
About the storyline, it's the same of the 1998 game. This isn't a reason to say that it's one of the best today, because it can perfectly mix a normal FPS game (where we can't aim) with a puzzle game.

Unless you're a purist, this is probably the best way to enjoy this classic game in the modern era.  In retrospect, it's not perfect - there's a few points where you really struggle to find the best way forward  and a few levels drag more than they should, but otherwise, well, this is Half-Life, the thinking man's shooter.  The formula wasn't perfected until HL2, but this version shares it's gene pool, and that should be enough for most.

Jogar o HL1 normal e depois suas expansões, e faz o mesmo com o HL2.

I ended up playing this game several years late. Despite the fact that there were more technologically advanced games available when I played it, I still found myself immersed in both the universe that the game was painting, as well as the mechanics of the gameplay itself. Sure, some things leave a little to be desired (looking at you, ladders), but the fact that people still talk about, play about, and modify this game (see: Black Mesa) should be testament to its timelessness.

Эта игра является ремейком оригинальной игры Half Life 1998 года.Она использует более прогрессивный игровой движок Sourse, однако в связи с тем, что в игре былы использованы те же самые текстуры, что и в оригинале, графика не улучшилась.Но зато здесь сохранилась неповторимая атмосфера, которая была в оригинале.Игра хуже, чем Black Mesa, но мне она понравилась.

Вспоминая времена когда я был ещё очень  молодым мальчиком я впервые запустил Игру Half  life на своем тогда ещё по нынешним меркам средненьком компьютере не прошло и 30 минут как я в полном восторге ни на что не отвлекаясь погрузился в увлекательный сюжет и приключения Гордона Фримена десятки часов летели напролет а я не отрывая  лица от экрана сидел и играл фактически я стал Гордоном Фрименом ))))) прошло уже много лет с того момента И  первая часть Half life  все так же вызывает у меня дивный восторг ведь она породила новую игровую вселенную которая насыщена абсолютно всем чем только можно порадовать человека который любит фантастику эта игра никогда не надоест её можно проходить снова и снова спустя месяцы годы даже десятилетия это шедевр который всегда будет жить в моем и в  сердцах многих миллионов игроков по всему миру  не говоря уже о  об официальных дополнениях Blue Shift  и Opposing Force и Decay  которые раскрывают нам другие подробности  инцидента в  Black Mesa и спустя столько лет я смотрю на нынешние игры и понимаю что больше таких шедевров не делают и возможно больше   не будут делать  так как игро индустрия деградировала которая теперь делает в основном уклон только на красивую графику и ничего более  Хочу закончить Игры сделавшие нас счастливыми бессмертны на веки веков

It's Half-Life with ragdolls, shinny weapons and better looking water.

It's buggy here and there but it's an overall pretty good game. 

If I had to decide from this version or the original I'd go with the original but this one, since it uses the source engine, can have stuff ported to Garry's Mod which gives it a one up in my opinion.

It's a Source port of a classic game that, together with it's sequel, changed the entire first-person shooter genre.

I'd love to give it a higher score but the bugs can sometimes break the immersion so this version of Half-Life get's a 7.5/10.

Half life source is a arena first person shooter,  looking for good graphics half life 1? try black mesa remake here in steam, before start I must say the reload sound effects are still not working for some reasons, thats why playing the remake is a better idea, its amazing game, and it was and still is the greatest story telling fps ever, I have completed the game twice, just make sure you skip the first level than this will be the greatest story telling fps, the first level is horrible two hours of nothing until you reach your first weapon in the game, after buying the game go to settings and add the hd weapons, so everyone likes more half life 2, but I like half life 1 better and in every direction, I know how much the gravity gun was improved in half life 2 blablabla, but that gun is also here and here we have other guns that are not in half life 2, so I first played this game in the special edition with deathmach classic and team fortress 1 bundle,  the game is epic, but my biggest problem was the time you would take in the first level, that is pretty much gone here, because you can pretty much skip the first level, gameplay is amazing and fast, shoot everything, breaking some stuff in the scenario, crazy jumps, big boss battles, cutscenes happening while you play the game, and yes with dialogue, no radio crap from fps games nowdays, its happening right there, no backstory, you, are, there ! its epic, and also for the first time in such a impactful way for the game industry, and here it is, in a version with much less bugs, I what a mean by that, they are all pretty much gone for good, you got to play it.

+a lot different weapons

+story line that actually makes you want to understand more
+the game behind the cration of cs go, portal and team fortress 2

Nevertheless it's interesting to try out an aged classic in a new Source shell. Plus a models integration into Garry's mod . I still give it a positive mark and recommend to buy once it's on sale. 

On the contrary, if you like a real, worthy remake of the Half-Life, get Black Mesa.

This is a needed improvement to the original HL.
I still don't understand why people would buy this game, you're better off buying Half-Life 1 than this so called remake.

Pros:
+ Ragdolls
+ Clear water makes spotting Ichtyosaurs easier
+ 16:9 resolution support
+ Actual 3D skybox on the cliff level

Cons:
- High-res impact decals and blood splatters clash with low-res surface textures
- New lighting effects don't look nice with low-res models and old textures
- Better physics engine is largely unnecessary
- Isn't much of an improvement on the original GoldSrc version

Conclusion: Just get the original, it looks better and plays just as well.
its pretty good
All I'll say is that if you are a fan of the FPS genre, this game is a must play. Such a classic, great feel even to this day.
Good Game

Half-Life: Source-не тот ремейк, который мы хотели когда-то давно, но всё же игра не плоха. Half-Life: Source критикуется за то, что она не показывает полностью качества движка Source из Half-Life 2. Это, главным образом, является следствием того, что были использованы текстуры и модели из оригинальной игры, а не созданы новые или использованы модели из High Definition Pack, который поставлялся с Half-Life: Blue Shift. Но как бы то не было, игра норм, всё тот же сюжет первой части, офигенная атмосфера и многое всего хорошего вас ожидает в этом переиздании. Вообщем, как бы то не было, я советую. Это классика, это легенда.
Definitely a "must play" game. Classics/10
An old relic of a game, yet still incredibly fun.
Best FPS I ever played! 9/11 would do again
A classic, but this time with hilarious ragdolls and slightly bugged hitboxes.
Somehow the ragdolls and physics of the source engine make this already great game even better.

Comment présenter Half-Life? Half-Life est le jeu qui avant le 3e millénaire m'a fait prendre conscience qu'un jeu pouvait avoir une histoire, pouvait avoir plus d'impact dans toute ma vie qu'un film, et que ç'était okay aussi, parce que les jeux sont des oeuvres qui permettent aux développeurs de raconter une histoire. Et half-life raconte une histoire, parce que Half-Life, c'est le jeu qui est si immersif qu'on se prend à rêver de se balader réellement dans Black Mesa. Half-Life, c'est le FPS qui a changé ma vie. Half-Life, c'est le jeu qui m'a plongé dans l'univers des jeux au scénario en béton. Half-Life, c'est le jeu auquel je peux revenir, et chaque fois que je reviens, je frissonne toujours autant quand je pense à toi, Nihilanth, le boss final d'un jeu épique, au cours d'une bataille pas moins épique. Je pense à toi G-man, qui est mystérieux, et emblématique.
Made me jump several times, this exciting game is the best and very much still holds up to this day 10/10
Great classic shooter
You can gib a security guard just by throwing a grenade at their head.

This is one of the buggiest games I have ever played. I decided to stop playing purely out of frustration. There are some unbelievable long load times (which I can promise are not hardware related). Random hang ups, freezes, pauses, and sound glitches which are all extremely annoying. Problems with saves dissapearing and reappearing. The AI on most of the monsters in the game is borked. The headcrabs, barnacles, and tenctacle creatures are all broken and not functioning correctly. Hit boxes are broken. The list goes on.

Just buy the original version of the game, Half-life source is trash.

Overall a fun game, but it is very plain.  It only took me 18 hours to complete, but it had become boring after only 8.  I finished just for the sake of completeness. Though I guess I'm not a big shooter game fan to begin with, it just seemed like the same thing over and over again after a while.  Shoot this, shoot that.  The storyline sequences happening in "real-time" instead of having cutscenes was pretty novel, and it was a snippet of a neat story involved, but other than that this is just a dusty old historical piece.  I would only recommend it to hardcore FPS fans who want to relive a milestone of the genre.  But even then... why not just get Black Mesa?

Oh, I should note that I had a bug early in the game, before any real action had taken place.  I couldn't walk through a door.  I had to work it out a using a cheat to "no-clip" through the door.  It ran just fine from then on.

Not entirely sure what the differences are between this and the original half life other than that they made some lighting fixes and made the water less ugly. They also made some of the puzzles clearer so that it doesn't take you forever to figure out what you are supposed to do.

Das Spiel ist gut.

Es ist eine verbesserte Neuauflage des Klassikers Half-Life ([url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198063825413/recommended/70]hier[/url] rezensiert).

Es unterstützt nun höhere Bildshirmauflösungen (HD), hat ein verbessertes Menü und besonders eine bessere Grafik. Letztere ist jetzt gut ab er nicht superb, jedenfalls eine deutliche Verbesserung.

Ich kann das Spiel daher noch mehr als das Original empfehlen.

Honestly, you shouldn't be playing this game unless you want the "full Half-Life story experience". It really hasn't aged well, first-person platforming is horrible, and the enemy AI has pretty terrible power scaling (any time an enemy is in your field of view it just aimbots you, meaning you can't actually have fights without taking massive damage). It's a good history lesson, but I don't think this game deserves high reviews. Play HL2 instead.

将半条命1代整体移植到了起源引擎之后，我发现NPC的AI有极大的提升。
黑山基地的保安在半条命起源里，火力精准而猛烈，并且遭遇到敌人的打击之后，保安们会逃跑或者寻找掩体。
Xen部分NPC的血量与AI也有所修改，使得Xen部分的整体难度变低。
V社在对起源引擎进行多次升级以后，在游戏设置里开启读取高清内容，画质也不是很差的嘛。
信仰，我是一定要推荐的！

tirando isso o jogo é bom :D
